mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, id, password, mname, phonenum, homenum, address, nickname, mdate, grade) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{mname}, #{phonenum}, #{homenum}, #{address}, #{nickname}, sysdate, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, password, mname, phonenum, homenum, address, nickname, mdate, grade FROM member ORDER BY grade ASC, id ASC
